Water.Description: Creates a water splash that damage enemies

Grass.Description: Create a bush that prevent passage to all beings

Earth.Description: Create a rock in a specific place that knock up and damage enemies

Thunder.Description: Create a thunder that passes through the enemies

Wind.Description: Create a strong wind blast that pushes enemies in a desired direction

Light.Description: Creates a light beam that damage enemies

Shadow.Description: Teleport player to a desired place
